82810.summary: Some customers in the Lynn Valley area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82810.title: Sept 5 - North Vancouver (Lynn Valley) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
